message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's designed to significantly enhance efficiency and productivity in your operations. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $12000. Considering the value it can bring to your business, I'm offering it to you for $15000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial arrangement.
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12000. I believe this is a fair price considering the product's value and my budget.
